entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
